channel.title: Where should i buy VPS?
channel.description: Well im looking to buy a VPS for my server but idk where i should buy it at i bought frugoos and they scammed me and my VPS isnt up nor have i goten a refund is there anywhere else thats not 2 pricey that i can get a VPS with easy set up?

item.title: Where should i buy VPS?
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

This is for a Windows VPS 1.At first, you should get an email with the ip of the VPS you ordered (May take 24-48 hours after purchase depending on who you bought it from) 2.Copy/paste that ip, now, go to your start button and go to 'run' 3.A search bar should come up when you launch it in that search bar, add "MSTSC" 4.Paste the ip on the bar for the ip you are connecting to. 5.Create a user named "Administrator" with the password of your VPS account. 6.Install java, and use uppit,mediafire,teamviewer etc. to get your source files in that VPS.

Read full topic
